language.required: :label is required. Can not be omitted.
language.enum: :label is impossible to specify the value contains the.
language.numeric-min: :label must be greater than or equal to :param:1.
language.numeric-max: :label must be less than or equal to :param:1.
language.between: :label must be less than or equal to :param:2 greater than or equal to :param:1.
language.length: :label must be less than or equal to :param:2 letter :param:1 or more characters
language.email: :label is the e-mail address must be.
language.regex: The format of the :label is incorrect.
